fields.description:
Recently, the manual {{Alloy.CFG.styles.*}} colors have been moved to named colors, which is a big step!

One thing we noticed though is that if we change from light- to dark mode, the app does not change the styles automatically. Other native apps do so. In addition, it seems like the "base styles" do change (like action bar title), but all own defined colors do not.
fields.summary: Android: Changing to night mode (dark mode) does not update app UI
